name: Star Catcher (itch) (Fabiulous Games)
description:
Ever since Holden was a child he used to look ap at the night sky and wondered if he'd ever be able to catch all those beautiful stars.

Now he is an astronaut and it's up to you to make his dream may finally come true.

//

I made this game in three hours for a three hour game jam hosted by Trijam. It's been a fun experience, I recommend these type of jams to any developer reading this, especially if hosted by Trijam.

I would love to hear your comments about the game.

Controls are really simple: just use the arrows to move the player around the Universe. Try to catch as many stars as possible but be careful to also get some oxygen otherwise Holden is going to die.

I uploaded the game as downloadable for Windows and Mac because today there seems to be trouble with the WebGL support for browsers like Firefox and Safari.

I used some free assets for the game, these are the links to all of them (I give them all the credits they deserve) :

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-pixel-space-platform-pa... (just the astronaut);

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox... (the skybox);

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/planet-earth-free-2... (the Earth in the background).
